method_binding.note: All 8 methods extracted from D6_Q1_Executor in executors.py

question_context.question_text: ¿Existe una 'teoría de cambio' explícita para la política migratoria, preferiblemente en un 'diagrama', que identifique causas, mediadores (ej. regularización) y 'supuestos verificables'?

patterns.pattern: teoría de cambio|marco lógico|cadena causal|modelo lógico de integración
diagrama causal|gráfico de la teoría de cambio|ruta causal
causa raíz de la vulnerabilidad|determinante de la no integración

signal_requirements.note: Signal requirements are under development. Canonical mapping pending for PA10/DIM06; mandatory_signals and optional_signals are intentionally empty to avoid blocking execution.

elements.description: Lista de elementos de evidencia encontrados para esta micro-pregunta.

confidence_scores.description: Scores de confianza usados por el scorer.

pattern_matches.description: Matches de patrones esperados vs texto.

assembly_rules.description: Combine evidence elements from 8 method invocations
Combine metadata from 8 methods for full traceability

question_global.description: Índice global de la pregunta (de questionnaire_monolith).

policy_area_id.description: PA canónica, debe ser coherente con identity.policy_area_id.

cluster_id.description: Cluster de análisis según el monolith, si aplica.

evidence.description: Objeto de evidencia ensamblado por el EvidenceNexus; debe cumplir evidence_assembly.output_schema.

validation.description: Resultado de validaciones lógicas de la respuesta (coherencia, integridad, etc.).

trace.description: Información de trazabilidad (provenance, logs) específica de la ejecución.

metadata.description: Metadatos adicionales de la pregunta para consumo posterior.

template.title: ## Análisis Q056 (D6-Q1): ¿Existe una 'teoría de cambio' explícita para la política migratoria, preferiblemente en un 'diagrama', que identifique causas, mediadore...
template.summary:
### Resumen Ejecutivo

**Área de política**: Migración transfronteriza

**Dimensión**: CAUSALIDAD

Se analizó la presencia de **{evidence.elements_found_count}** elementos de evidencia relevantes.

**Puntaje**: {score}/3.0 | **Calidad**: {quality_level}

method_combination_logic.combination_strategy: Sequential multi-method pipeline with evidence fusion
method_combination_logic.rationale: D6-Q1 (Q056) for PA10/DIM06 requires consistent extraction, validation, and synthesis across 8 methods. This block documents how the pipeline combines method outputs into a single evidence product.
method_combination_logic.evidence_fusion: Evidence from all methods is aggregated by the EvidenceNexus according to evidence_assembly. Overlaps are deduplicated where possible and confidence is propagated conservatively.
method_combination_logic.confidence_aggregation: Confidence is aggregated via contract-defined merge strategies, favoring calibrated methods when available.
trade_offs: Coverage vs. cost: using 8 methods increases coverage but raises computation and maintenance burden.
Recall vs. precision: multiple detectors increase recall but can introduce redundancy; deduplication and weighting mitigate this.
Sophistication vs. interpretability: advanced models can be less transparent; human_readable_output documents assumptions and limitations.

rules.description: Auto-generated: require all required expected_elements types
Auto-generated: encourage optional evidence types when available

traceability.provenance_note: This contract was generated with full multi-method orchestration support. The method_binding.methods array contains all 8 methods from D6_Q1_Executor, and human_answer_structure documents the expected evidence output after execution.

fallback_strategy.note: No fallback strategies enabled. All failures propagate according to error_handling configuration.

calibration.note: Contract does not embed calibration scores. Actual calibration managed via src/farfan_core/core/calibration/ + config/intrinsic_calibration.json + config/fusion_specification.json

human_answer_structure.description: Expected structure of evidence dict after all 8 methods execute and evidence is assembled according to assembly_rules

assembly_flow.step_1_method_execution: 8 methods execute in priority order, outputs stored with dot-notation keys
assembly_flow.step_2_evidence_assembly: EvidenceNexus merges outputs according to assembly_rules
assembly_flow.step_4_output_generation: Phase2QuestionResult constructed with evidence, validation, trace

evidence_structure_schema.description: Assembled evidence after all methods complete

elements_found.description: Concatenated evidence elements from multiple methods (assembly_rules target)
elements_found.example_count: Expected 15-50 elements for a complete diagnostic

pattern_matches.description: Aggregated pattern matches from text mining methods

financial_summary.description: Aggregated financial data from FinancialAuditor and PDETMunicipalPlanAnalyzer

elements_found.source_sentence: según datos de DANE para el año 2022

contradictions.interpretation: No statistical contradictions in quantitative claims

validation_against_expected_elements.overall_validation_result: PASS - All required and minimum elements present
